Package org.aposin.licensescout.report.mojo

Class JavaReportMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
        • org.aposin.licensescout.report.mojo.AbstractReportMojo
          • org.aposin.licensescout.report.mojo.JavaReportMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport, IRepositoryParameters
    @Mojo(name="report",
      defaultPhase=SITE,
      requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME,
      requiresReports=true)
public class JavaReportMojo
extends AbstractReportMojo
    Scans Java installation directory for licenses and generates a Maven site report.
